title: chest
body: hello rito guys^.^ so i was thinking if i can have one chest? i mean i have a key and i want to open one chest but my next chest will be up in a week :(

replies.body: Hmmmmm I can't really go around making it rain hextech chests, that'd probably end up pretty painful for everyone involved. However, if you're ever a short amount of RP away from being able to buy something (think lower double digits) then hit us up with some kind of artwork and we can make some sort of deal!
